I'd even say some shades of Hitchcock...this is clearly better than MMM, which is seen as a guilty pleasure by some if not most Woody fans.
Takes everything from all the earlier Woody movies (talking to camera, the shooting in black & white) and perfects it with great locations and an actual plot.
